display_long_description:
Leap, climb, and race your way through exhilarating virtual landscapes in Early Tag, the ultimate VR tag experience! Dive into fast-paced, physics-driven gameplay where your hands and arms are your only tools for movement—no joysticks required. Whether you're swinging through jungle gyms, bounding across rooftops, or dashing through dense forests, every chase feels dynamic and immersive.

Compete against friends or strangers in a variety of game modes, from classic tag to team challenges and obstacle courses. Customize your character with unique skins, emotes, and accessories to showcase your style as you outmaneuver opponents with strategic movement and clever tactics.

With stunning environments, responsive mechanics, and adrenaline-pumping action, Early Tag delivers a one-of-a-kind VR multiplayer experience that will keep you coming back for more. Are you ready to run, jump, and outplay the competition?
